column2: salad was good. On to the main dishes. The pizza was subpar. Very thin crust
column3: I almost didn't even know it had a crust at the bottom and not much cheese. Now the pasta. They said they make homemade sauce
column4: there's no way! The creamy sauce tasted like a canned sauce with cheese added. It have zero flavor
column5: not much chicken at all. It was horrible.
